attributes.action: pick the telephone and congratulate Alex Salmond MSP MP on his election as First Minister of Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland has traditionally congratulated the election of a premier of a devolved administration and indeed the election of many new foreign heads of government and state. Four weeks after polling and following the election of the first SNP First Minister of Scotland, Tony Blair has failed to congratulate Mr Salmond, a snub to Scotland as much to Mr Salmond personally.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
